title: Svetlana in Heels: A short story about the power of beautiful feet
description: Svetlana in Heels: Anal Sex, Foot Fetish, Femdom, Shoe Fetish Richard loves his job. He's loved it from day one. The clients can be total bitches, but he still loves every day he spends in that shoe boutique. It never really occurred to him why he enjoyed working there so much, until he met Svetlana; and it dawned on him that he was a slave to beautiful heels and even more beautiful feet.
author: Robert India
